original_text: The male goat boasted even more about its power. Its large horn became very strong. But then the horn broke. Four other large horns came up in its place. Each of these horns pointed in a different direction.
korean_text: 숫염소가 스스로 심히 강대하여 가더니 강성할 때에 그 큰 뿔이 꺾이고 그 대신에 현저한 뿔 넷이 하늘 사방을 향하여 났더라

sentences.original_text: The male goat boasted even more about its power.
sentences.korean_translation: 수염소는 자신의 권능에 대해 더욱더 자랑했습니다.

sentences.original_text: Its large horn became very strong.
Four other large horns came up in its place.
sentences.korean_translation: 그 자리에 다른 네 개의 큰 뿔이 솟아났습니다.

sentences.original_text: Each of these horns pointed in a different direction.
sentences.korean_translation: 이 뿔들은 각각 다른 방향을 향했습니다.
